title: About
description: Learn more about Living The Dream Florals, our passion, and our story.

seo.title: About - Living The Dream Florals
seo.description: Discover the heart behind Living The Dream Florals, our dedication to crafting elegant floral arrangements for weddings, private events, and special occasions.

content.title: A Passion for Floral Artistry
content.subtitle: Thank you for taking the time to get to know me and my passion for floral design!

image.alt: Sara Nolan, owner of Living The Dream Florals

content.title: Meet Sara Nolan
description: Sara Nolan was born and raised in Maryland and moved to Florida for college, where she fell in love with the floral business.

With a deep admiration for nature’s beauty, Sara began designing floral arrangements for friends and family. Soon, her passion blossomed into a business, bringing stunning floral designs to weddings, private events, and special occasions.
content.quote: “I have always had an admiration for nature’s beauty and loved picking flowers, arranging them, and making moments unforgettable.”

getToKnowMe: I love eating chocolate chip cookies
And praising the Lord, all the days of my life
experience: Originally from Severna Park, Maryland, now residing and working in West Palm Beach, Florida.
Graduated from Palm Beach Atlantic University in 2023.
Full-time Senior Admissions Counselor at the university.
Booking weddings, events, arrangements, proms, and gender reveal bouquets.
additionalInfo.questions: Feel free to reach out at livingthedreamflorals@gmail.com! I’d be more than happy to schedule a time to call or meet to talk about florals and more!
additionalInfo.travel: Yes! I am more than willing to travel, as long as expenses are paid for! Feel free to reach out to further discuss this process!

content.title: Let's Create Something Beautiful Together
content.description: From weddings to private events, Living The Dream Florals is dedicated to crafting breathtaking floral arrangements for every special moment.
